name: 2kb Amazon DropShip Manager
author: 2kblater.com

sections.description:
Features

  • Import amazon products
  • Keep track of price and quantity changes
  • Email notifications
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload 2kb-amazon-dropship-manager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate 2kb Amazon DropShip Manager plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open 2kb Amazon DropShip Manager from admin menu or go to link YOUR_BLOG.COM/wp-admin/admin.php?page=kbAmzDropShipManager and follow the instructions.

short_description: Amazon DropShip Manager helps drop ship sellers to manager their products more easily. This plugin will help you keep track of quantity and price.
description:
Features

  • Import amazon products
  • Keep track of price and quantity changes
  • Email notifications
